abstract: Travel Q&A offers excerpts from interview with Geoffrey Kent, founder and chief executive of Abercrombie & Kent, tour company offering 350 luxury tours in more than 100 countries; shares his views on how sustainable, nature-based tourism can help conservation efforts in Africa and around globe.
lead_paragraph: The founder of the luxury tour operation Abercrombie & Kent, Geoffrey Kent, talks about sustainable tourism and offering expeditions to places people haven’t been before.

headline.main: Taking a Path of Conservation to Tourism
headline.print_headline: Geoffrey Kent on Tourism and Conservation.

snippet: The founder of the luxury tour operation Abercrombie & Kent, Geoffrey Kent, talks about sustainable tourism and offering expeditions to places people haven’t been before.
